title: Order mission to get 400 minions bugged?

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
On the left side, you can see the minion kills in the previous 5v5 normal game I played. And yes I do have an Order icon equipped.

Any idea why this occured?

replies.body: I wrote on NA forum since the replies here from Riot support is so much faster and better. I'm from EUW but I really hope you're still able to assist me! :)

Thanks!  The only one I'm seeing right now is for you to select a side, not for minions.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a closer look at this one.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=G2n6viPB,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-06-20T22:38:14.610+0000)
>
> Thanks!  The only one I'm seeing right now is for you to select a side, not for minions.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a closer look at this one.

Aw. I already did select a side by playing Co-op vs AI. I then played an ARAM with my friend since his mission was to get a win in Howling Abyss and my mission is to get 400 minion kills as a team in one game, which we managed to.
Sure, I will do that. Thanks! :)

I tried to find some info for you, but I'm guessing I'm not looking at the right account.  No worries, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) anyway and we can take a closer look individually to see what happened.  In the case that something did go wrong, we might be able to work something out too.  See ya there!
